mapper.insert: insert into TEAM_CHAT(chat_id, team_id, tmem_id, chat_content, chat_regdate) values(team_chat_seq.nextval, #{ groupId }, #{ senderId }, #{ message }, to_date(#{ sendTime }, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select tc.CHAT_CONTENT message, tc.CHAT_REGDATE sendTime, m.MEM_NICKNAME sender, m.mem_photo profilePhoto, m.mem_id senderId from (select * from team_chat where team_id = #{ teamId }) tc join member m on tc.TMEM_ID = m.MEM_ID order by chat_regdate asc
